title: Sale Or Return Bride
description: The bride may be getting married in white...It's the wedding of the year--two of Greece's oldest dynasties are uniting. Their feud is over and Sebastien Fiorukis is to marry Alesia Philipos.But she has been purchased for her husband's pleasure!Alesia is not a willing wife--she's been bought by Sebastien! He needs an heir...but a child is something she will never give him...!
author: Sarah Morgan
